headline: Stifel Analyst Maintains Buy Rating on Adobe (ADBE) After Earnings Beat
summary: Adobe Inc. (NASDAQ:ADBE) is one of the AI Stocks Analysts Say You Should Watch Closely. On September 12, Stifel analyst Parker Lane reiterated a Buy rating on the stock with a $480.00 price target after the company posted better-than-expected quarterly results. The firm cited several factors behind Adobe’s strong performance, particularly its artificial intelligence initiatives, pricing […]

headline: Goldman Sachs Reiterates Buy on Adobe (ADBE) With $570 PT, Citing AI Momentum
summary: Adobe Inc. (NASDAQ:ADBE) is one of the Trending AI Stocks on Wall Street. On September 12, Goldman Sachs analyst Kash Rangan reiterated a Buy rating on the stock with a $570.00 price target. Adobe shares rose after hours on strong revenue, margin, and cash flow results coupled with modest revenue guidance. While investors have been questioning […]

headline: Citizens JMP Reiterates Market Perform on Adobe (ADBE) Following Q3 Beat
summary: Adobe Inc. (NASDAQ:ADBE) is one of the AI Stocks in the Spotlight for Investors. On September 12, Citizens JMP analyst Patrick Walravens reiterated a Market Perform rating on the stock following better-than-expected F3 Q25 results.
